mapper.select: SELECT A.PROD_NO PROD_NO, TRAN_NO, PROD_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = A.CATEGORY_NO) as CATEGORY_NAME, MANUFACTURE_DAY, PROD_DETAIL, SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_AMOUNT, AS_YN, A.SELLER_ID SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = B.BUYER_ID) as BUYER_NAME, RECEIVER_ID, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = B.RECEIVER_ID) as RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, DLVY_EXPECT_DAY, DLVY_ADDR, DLVY_COMP_NO, (SELECT DLVY_COMP_NAME FROM DELIVERY_COMPANY WHERE DLVY_COMP_NO = B.DLVY_COMP_NO) DLVY_COMP_NAME, DLVY_REQUEST, PAYMENT_OPTION, D.CODE_NAME PAYMENT_OPTION_NAME, RECEIPT_YN, A.TRAN_STATUS_CODE TRAN_STATUS_CODE, C.CODE_NAME TRAN_STATUS_CODE_NAME, IMAGE_FILE FROM PRODUCT A, TRANSACTION B, (SELECT CODE_TYPE, CODE, CODE_NAME FROM CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'A03') C, (SELECT CODE_TYPE, CODE, CODE_NAME FROM CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'A04') D WHERE A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO(+) AND A.PROD_NO = #{prodNo} AND B.TRAN_STATUS_CODE = C.CODE(+) AND B.PAYMENT_OPTION = D.CODE(+)
